q1: How is the weighted average calculated?
a1: Each grade is multiplied by its weight, summed together, then divided by the total weight. Formula: Sum(grade Ã— weight) / Sum(weights).
q3: Can I use different weight values?
a3: Yes, you can assign any weight to each subject. Common weights are credit hours or percentage of final grade.
q4: Is there a limit on subjects?
a4: No, you can add as many subjects as needed. Click the add button to include more entries.
